amendment.description: To fund urgent priorities for our Nation's firefighters, law enforcement personnel, emergency medical personnel, and all Americans by reducing the tax breaks for individuals with annual incomes in excess of $1 million.

action.text: Amendment SA 1202 proposed by Senator Dodd.
Point of order under the Budget Act raised in Senate with respect to amendment SA 1202.
Motion to waive the Budget Act with respect to amendment SA 1202 made in Senate.
Motion to waive the Budget Act with respect to amendment SA 1202 rejected in Senate by Yea-Nay Vote. 36 - 60. Record Vote Number: 177.
Amendment SA 1202 ruled out of order by the chair.
